spec_data.Name: pacmanager
spec_data.Description:
PAC is a telnet/ssh/rsh/etc connection manager/automator written in Perl GTK
aimed at making administration easier. Users who may have used SecureCRT,
PuTTY, and/or mRemoteNG in the past may find this application useful.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:24:57 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl Auto Connector a multi-purpose SSH/terminal connection manager
